entry.title: Juicy Drop Pop - 12 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Topps
Type: Candy
Price: 23.50

Be Cool with Juicy Drop Pop Candy

Give your customers twice the candy with the Juicy Drop Pop! Drop the sweet liquid on the lollipop before you take a lick. Make your lollipop experience extra juicy and tasty. Juicy Drop Pop comes in five cool and delicious flavours including Blue Rebel, Berry Bomb, Knock Out Punch, Blue Raspberry Watermelon Blast, and Apple Attack. The Juicy Drop Pop is a double dose of awesome sweetness!

.92 oz Pop | 12 COUNT BOX

Ingredients: Sugar, invert glucose syrup, glucose syrup, water, citric acid, buffered lactic acid, glycerine, artificial flavour, yellow 5, potassium sorbate (preservative), blue 1. Berry Bomb: citric acid, buffered lactic acid, natural and artificial flavours, glycerine, titanium dioxide, potassium sorbate (preservative), red 40 lake, red 3, blue 1. Blue Rebel: citric acid, buffered lactic acid, artificial flavour, glycerine, potassium sorbate (preservative), blue 1. Knock-Out Punch: Buffered lactic acid, citric acid, glycerine, natural and artificial flavours, titanium dioxide, potassium, sorbate (preservative), red 40 lake, red 3, red 40, yellow 6 lake. Blue Raspberry Watermelon: citric acid, buffered lactic acid, artificial flavour, glycerine, titanium dioxide, potassium sorbate (preservative), blue 1 lake, blue 1, yellow 5 lake, yellow 5.

Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer and considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to product labelling or contact manufacturer directly for current data.

Bazooka Throwback Bubble Gum

Bazooka brand's iconic bubble gum is available in a handy 225-piece tub! The signature taste of Bazooka Bubble Gum you know and love with a throwback to the brand's classic look plus original comics!
